entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
